import React, { useState } from "react"; import Button from "./Button"; const Nav = () => { let links =[ {name:'Home',link:"/"}, {name:'Articles',link:"/"}, {name:'Events',link:"/"}, {name:'About',link:"/"}, ] let [open,setOpen]= useState(false); return(
Fintelogy
setOpen(!open)} className="text-3xl absolute right-8 top-6 cursor-pointer md:hidden">
    { links.map((link)=>(
  • {link.name}
    • )) }
) } export default Nav;
